channel.title: No-ip Serever Running trouble
channel.description:
I had my server running perfectly yesterday using no-ip
i went to do it again today and it wont work
i put my server on then no-ip
i logged in without typing my server ip (i never do that wastes time) and then i somone asked me "is the server online i cannot connect" i said yes it is try connection using my ip adress it didnt work
i logged out and tryed my no-ip address in the box and it didnt work
why is this?

item.title: No-ip Serever Running trouble
item.dc:creator: @Tranquil Tranquil
item.description:
@Tranquil wrote:

I had my server running perfectly yesterday using no-ip

i went to do it again today and it wont work

i put my server on then no-ip

i logged in without typing my server ip (i never do that wastes time)
and then i somone asked me
“is the server online i cannot connect”
i said yes it is try connection using my ip adress
it didnt work

i logged out and tryed my no-ip address in the box and it didnt work

why is this?
